org.hibernate.validator.constraints

注释类型 SafeHtml


  • @Documented
 @Constraint(validatedBy={})
 @Target(value={METHOD,FIELD,ANNOTATION_TYPE,CONSTRUCTOR,PARAMETER,TYPE_USE})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Repeatable(value=SafeHtml.List.class)
public @interface SafeHtml
    Validate a rich text value provided by the user to ensure that it contains no malicious code, such as embedded <script> elements.

    Note that this constraint assumes you want to validate input which represents a body fragment of an HTML document. If you instead want to validate input which represents a complete HTML document, add the html, head and body tags to the used whitelist as required.

    • 可选元素概要

      可选元素 
      限定符和类型 可选元素和说明
      String[] additionalTags 
      SafeHtml.Tag[] additionalTagsWithAttributes 
      String baseURI 
      Class<?>[] groups 
      String message 
      Class<? extends javax.validation.Payload>[] payload 
      SafeHtml.WhiteListType whitelistType 

    • 元素详细资料

      • message

        public abstract String message
        默认值:
        "{org.hibernate.validator.constraints.SafeHtml.message}"

      • groups

        public abstract Class<?>[] groups
        默认值:
        {}

      • payload

        public abstract Class<? extends javax.validation.Payload>[] payload
        默认值:
        {}

      • whitelistType

        public abstract SafeHtml.WhiteListType whitelistType
        返回:
        The built-in whitelist type which will be applied to the rich text value
        默认值:
        org.hibernate.validator.constraints.SafeHtml.WhiteListType.RELAXED

      • additionalTags

        public abstract String[] additionalTags
        返回:
        Additional whitelist tags which are allowed on top of the tags specified by the whitelistType().
        默认值:
        {}

      • additionalTagsWithAttributes

        public abstract SafeHtml.Tag[] additionalTagsWithAttributes
        返回:
        Allows to specify additional whitelist tags with optional attributes and protocols.
        默认值:
        {}

      • baseURI

        public abstract String baseURI
        返回:
        Base URI used to resolve relative URIs to absolute ones. If not set, validation of HTML containing relative URIs will fail.
        从以下版本开始:
        6.0
        默认值:
        ""
